This is all Tiffany=92s fault.  She was the one who started me thinking (a=
nd remembering Barb telling me about how fun a round robin could be with th=
e writers & Shinsengumi nuts (my description, not hers=85 don=92t go after =
her with katana in gatotsu stance) we have here) by imagining directing Hij=
ikata in a commercial to advertise a bath sponge over on the message board.=


 

So, chime in.  What do you guys think about starting a round robin her=
e?  I=92m willing to keep tabs on the organization, but what do YOU want to=
 do?  We need ideas about scenarios=85 some rules, like how long a person h=
as to get their section posted and what happens if they can=92t get it done=
=85 anything else that comes to mind.  It=92s been a while for me, but thos=
e I participated in were private and very small=85 really more like RPG tha=
n a true round robin, so I=92m counting on veterans to make suggestions bas=
ed on their experience.  If we come up with a list of scenarios, I can crea=
te a poll for us to make a final choice (and anything else that needs decid=
ing).

 

And, please, don=92t anyone be shy!!!  This is purely for fun=85 =
no Pulitzer Prize hopes here.  Join in!!  Good way to get your hand in at s=
ome writing without being responsible for the whole thing.

 
phil
